Package helpers

Class Move

java.lang.Object
helpers.Move
public class Move
extends java.lang.Object
Immutable class Move represents a move from one point to anther.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.awt.Point end
    The end point for the move.
    private int hashcode
    The hashcode for the move generated with Arrays.hashCode() when the move is initialized.
    private java.awt.Point start
    The start point for the move.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Move​(java.awt.Point start, java.awt.Point end)
    Initialize a new move from the start to the end point.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Get a string representation of the move. This method dose not delegate to Point's to toString because in to verbose e.g. getClass().getName() + "[x=" + x + ",y=" + y + "]".
      Overrides:
